column4: I have seen GNOME3 installed in parallel to GNOME2.  You can't run them in the same session, obviously, but there's no reason they couldn't both be installed and even running in different sessions concurrently.
so basically, I've to make the choice at the log-in screen ?
Yup, that's how I saw it when I did, if you see what I mean.
No upgrade is ever straightforward.  Unless it's lulling you into a false sense of security.
